H0.text: In 1483, who was appointed the first grand inquisitor of the Spanish Inquisition. Pedro de Arbues

H1.text: In 1483, who was appointed the first grand inquisitor of the Spanish Inquisition. Alonso de Ojeda

H2.text: In 1483, who was appointed the first grand inquisitor of the Spanish Inquisition. Rodrigo Borgia

H3.text: In 1483, who was appointed the first grand inquisitor of the Spanish Inquisition. Torquemada

A4.text: Tomás de Torquemada was named Grand Inquisitor of Spain in 1483

A5.text: Tomás de Torquemada was the first Grand Inquisitor of the Spanish Inquisition
